1.details: Successfully completed comprehensive rebrand and transformation from membership organization to Islamic Society of Sarasota and Bradenton mosque platform

2.details: Updated entire application with Islamic-appropriate green color palette (emerald, forest green tones)

3.details: Optimized and integrated provided mosque images with 97.8% file size reduction for better performance

4.details: Added prayer times API integration, Islamic calendar, Islamic donation categories, Islamic events management

5.details: Implemented Strategic Plan 2025-2035 focus areas: Budget monitoring, Community engagement, Risk management, KPI tracking

6.content: Update Portal Structure for Mosque Operations
6.details: Reconfigured portals for mosque/community operations: Events (prayers, Islamic education), Community (service programs), Donations (Zakat, Sadaqah), Admin (facility management)

7.details: Created Stripe payment integration for Islamic donations (Zakat, Sadaqah, Building Fund) - ready for API keys
